member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_PRIORITY
member.summary: The rendering priority affects the extent to which Direct2D will throttle its rendering workload.

member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_PRIORITY.D2D1_RENDERING_PRIORITY_NORMAL
member.summary: No change in rendering workload priority.

member.name: D2D1_RENDERING_PRIORITY.D2D1_RENDERING_PRIORITY_LOW
member.summary: The device and its associated device contexts are given a lower priority than others.
